result.reason: mRemoteNG currently supports team collaboration via SQL Server configuration. Clarification is required to determine if the user is requesting file-based synchronization (e.g. merge/lock), cloud integration, or specific improvements to the existing SQL implementation.
result.approach: Identify the desired synchronization medium (File/Cloud/DB) and requirements for conflict resolution.
